description: Identifies execution of nltest.exe and dsquery.exe for domain trust discovery. This technique is used by attackers to enumerate Active Directory trusts.
false_positives: Legitimate use of the utilities by legitimate user for legitimate reason
name: Domain Trust Discovery
query: ((process.executable:*\\nltest.exe AND process.command_line:(*domain_trusts* OR *all_trusts* OR *\/trusted_domains* OR *\/dclist*)) OR (process.executable:*\\dsquery.exe AND process.command_line:*trustedDomain*) OR (process.executable:*\\dsquery.exe AND process.command_line:*\-filter* AND process.command_line:*trustedDomain*))
author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections
Tony Lambert)
oscd.community
omkar72
